title: Big group of cheap mid-tier backs
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Big group of cheap mid-tier backs
posts.post_content:
All prices include shipping and insurance (within the US) and assume a no-fee payment method.  If you'd like to use Paypal Goods and Services, that's fine, just add 3.5%.  I have to collect sales tax from Washington state buyers.

$79 each:
Bates Old Mill PSA A
Goode Old Mill PSA 1
Jones Cycle 350 SGC A SOLD
Killian Old Mill PSA 1
Niles Sov150 PSA A
Oldring Old Mill PSA 1
Wiltse Old Mill PSA A
